Title: Abuja hosts ‘Taste of Naija, celebrating unity, culture, local cuisine
Summary: Taste of Naija, organised by Mojo Fusion Ltd CIC, is an annual event that celebrates the organisation’s commitment to promoting peaceful co-existence . Expectations are high ahead of a concert in Abuja .

Title: Oyindamola Olugbile wins 2025 NLNG Nigeria Prize for Literature with debut novel, ‘Sanya’
Summary: Nigerian author Oyindamola Olugbile wins the $100,000 grand prize for her debut novel, Sanya . The 2025 Nigeria Prize for Literature was sponsored by the Nigeria Liquefied Natural Gas (NLNG) company .

Title: Borno: Six soldiers killed as troops repel Boko Haram attack in Ngamdu
Summary: Nigerian military forces successfully repelled an attempted Boko Haram attack on their position in Ngamdu community in Borno State . Six soldiers were killed and six others wounded in the engagement .

Title: Baptist Seminary, Muslim Council reject claims Nigeria violates religious rights
Summary: The Baptist Theological Seminary, Kaduna, urged the Muslim Council to reject claims Nigeria violates religious rights . The Baptist Seminary and Muslim Council reject claims that the country violates religious freedom . They say such characterisations risk deepening insecurity and exacerbating interfaith tensions .

Title: Five films that capture mental health with honesty and depth
Summary: World Mental Health Day was marked on Friday, 10 October . More people are realising that mental health is real, and films have become vital tools to tell stories that statistics cannot .

Title: Top 10 smallest countries in the world
Summary: Vatican City serves as the headquarters of the Roman Catholic Church and the official residence of the Pope . Vatican City is located in Vatican City and is home to the Vatican .

Title: Mbappe out of France’s World Cup qualifier in Iceland with sore ankle
Summary: Mbappe "will not be able to play Monday against Iceland," a French Football Federation (FFF) statement read . France face Iceland in a World Cup qualifier in Iceland on Monday .

Title: Diaspora health professionals warn of looming NCD crisis, urge FG to act fast
Summary: Diaspora health professionals warn of looming NCD crisis, urge FG to act fast . Call for stronger policy, research, prevention strategy at NAFTRAPH .

Title: Senate won’t be held hostage by any member – Akpabio
Summary: Akpabio: Nigeria’s Senate belongs in that global fellowship of parliaments that recognise chaos as the heart of anarchy and order as the soul of democracy . The Senate won't be held hostage by any member, he says .

Title: Defections: Those remaining in PDP are undertakers — APC
Summary: Oladejo urged the former ruling party to stop downplaying ‘wave of defections currently rocking its already fractured structure” He urged the PDP not to downplay the defections .
